extension.description:
OSM Plugin

by Ariel Küchler

see https://github.com/admiralsmaster/osm_akuechler

Versions

  1. 2.6.0
    • #3 leafletjs upgrade to 1.2.0
    • #1 Default tiles URL to HTTPS
    • #1 Fix PHP warnings
    • #2 Add CSS to prevent image resizing in purity_iii template
    • Add update server
  2. 2.5.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 1.1.0
    • add unpkg.com CDN
  3. 2.4.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 1.0.3
  4. 2.3.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 1.0.1
  5. 2.2.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 1.0.0
  6. 2.1.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.7.7
  7. 2.0.0
    • Change the API. Now you can use HTML-Tags only.
  8. 1.3.0
    • add support for jsdelivr
    • Please check your CDN configuration after installation.
  9. 1.2.0
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.7.3
    • Support Interaction Options
    • Fix default value for retina support.
  10. 1.1.0
    • It is possible to configurate the Retina detection of the Leaflet library. Default is activate.
    • Add possibility to configurate copyright hint and max zoom level.
  11. 1.0.6
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.7.1
  12. 1.0.5
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.6.2
    • Possible to switch to Cloundflares CDNJS.
  13. 1.0.4
    • IE CSS usage,
    • not run on admin pages,
    • no backslash at Windows systems in HTML,
    • copyright and maximal zoom configurable,
    • better code
  14. 1.0.3
    • leaflet 0.4.5
  15. 1.0.2
    • Bugfix "+" to "." String concat
  16. 1.0.1
    • better code
  17. 1.0.0
    • initial version, leaflet 0.4

field.name: maxZoom
field.label: Max Zoom
field.description: The max zoom level of tiles.

field.name: cdn-usage
field.label: Use CDN JS
field.description: Use Cloudflares CDNJS, JsDelivr, unpkg.com or local files

field.name: detect-retina
field.label: Detect Retina
field.description: Activate the Retina detection of Leaflet library.

field.name: dragging
field.label: Map draggable
field.description: Whether the map be draggable with mouse/touch or not.

field.name: touchZoom
field.label: Touch draggable
field.description: Whether the map can be zoomed by touch-dragging with two fingers.

field.name: scrollWheelZoom
field.label: With mouse zoomable
field.description: Whether the map can be zoomed by using the mouse wheel. If passed 'center', it will zoom to the center of the view regardless of where the mouse was.

field.name: doubleClickZoom
field.label: Map zoomed in by double clicking
field.description: Whether the map can be zoomed in by double clicking on it and zoomed out by double clicking while holding shift. If passed 'center', double-click zoom will zoom to the center of the view regardless of where the mouse was.

field.name: boxZoom
field.label: With mouse rectangular zoomable
field.description: Whether the map can be zoomed to a rectangular area specified by dragging the mouse while pressing shift.

field.name: tap
field.label: Map supporting instant taps
field.description: Enables mobile hacks for supporting instant taps (fixing 200ms click delay on iOS/Android) and touch holds (fired as contextmenu events).

field.name: tapTolerance
field.label: Tap tolerance in pixel
field.description: The max number of pixels a user can shift his finger during touch for it to be considered a valid tap.

field.name: trackResize
field.label: Map handle browser resizing
field.description: Whether the map automatically handles browser window resize to update itself.

field.name: worldCopyJump
field.label: World copy jump
field.description: With this option enabled, the map tracks when you pan to another 'copy' of the world and seamlessly jumps to the original one so that all overlays like markers and vector layers are still visible.

field.name: closePopupOnClick
field.label: Popup close when user click map
field.description: Set it to false if you don't want popups to close when user clicks the map.

field.name: bounceAtZoomLimits
field.label: Boucing on zoom bounces
field.description: Set it to false if you don't want the map to zoom beyond min/max zoom and then bounce back when pinch-zooming.
